changeSet.author: Unicentaopos - John L
changeSet.id: Add Colour column to Categories table

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user access to the sales panel, this is required to sell items.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user access to the historic tickets panel.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user access to the Customer Payment panel, used for account payments.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the Payments panel, cash in/out of the till.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the Close Cash panel.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows user to edit ticket lines in sales screen.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to edit an historic ticket.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to refund an historic ticket.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user or print an historic ticket.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to complete sales ('=' button), if they are going to operate the till this is required.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to changes the tax options on the sales screen.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to take bank payments when completing sale.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to take cash payments when completing sale.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to take cheque payments when completing sale.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to take voucher payments when completing sale.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to take card payments when completing sale.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to make the sale free of charge when completing sale. It is not recommened to enable this.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to assign the payment to a customers account.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allow the user to issue a cash refund.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allow the user to issue a cheque refund.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allow the user to issue a voucher refund.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allow the user to issue a card refund.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to send ticket to the kitchen printer.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Enables the print ticket button, this will print a preview receipt, useful in restaurant mode.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Enables the 'NO Sale' - 'Open cash drawer' button.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Enables the single line discount button. *** Must also been enabled in 'Ticket.Buttons'.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the Tools panel, for example CSV import option.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the CSV import option.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to clear the CSV imprt database.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: A report of any bad price details that CSV imported found whilst importing data.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: A report of any bad Category details that CSV imported found whilst importing data, if the option was selected.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: A report of any invalid details that CSV imported found whilst importing data.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: A report of any missing details that CSV imported found whilst importing data.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: A report of any new products that CSV imported found whilst importing data. This only shows products taht did not have any errors.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: A report of any price updates for products already in the database, that CSV found found whilst importing data.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user access to the 'Presence Management' functions.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the 'Breaks' panel to configure employee break types.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the 'Leaves' panel to configure employee leaves.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to use the 'Check In/Out' option, for time management.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: This functions is from Openbravo time period and currently not a default function for Unicenta.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: This functions is from Openbravo time period and currently not a default function for Unicenta.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the current user to change their own Passord.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows teh user to accesss the 'Printers' panel.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Allows the user to access the configuration options for the system.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: *** This report will not work with the embedded database.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: *** This report will not work with the embedded database.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: *** This report will not work with the embedded database.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.value: Alows the user to delete items sent to the kitchen from the ticket
